message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be valuable to you. I'm thinking in the range of  $15,000 to start.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, however, I can't go as low as $10,000. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
